MegaZoneHosting – SSD Powered Hosting, Master Resellers, OpenVZ/KVM VPS from $1/yr in New York, USA!

bitcoin, buffalo, cpanel, credit card, ipv4, kvm, megazonehosting, new york, openvz, paypal, reseller, shared, SolusVM, whm November 29, 2018 @ 11:00 am, by Daniel Spritzer

The party continues at LowEndBox throughout Cyber Week! This offer is courtesy of Brad from MegaZoneHosting who recently contacted us with some Cyber Week deals that we hope everyone will enjoy! They are offering shared hosting starting at $1/yr, Master Reseller Hosting starting at $10/yr, OpenVZ & KVM VPS from $14/yr!

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PayPal, Cryptocurrency and Credit Cards as payment methods.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“MegaZoneHosting is a web hosting provider that goes beyond just hosting. We will not only help you achieve your overall website hosting goals, but also assure you with the confidence that you are partnered with a reliable and competent hosting provider.

All of our servers are powered by RAID-10 SSD drives, this means that you will be able to achieve maximum performance and redundancy by choosing to host on our platform. We do not use any sort of spinning or traditional drives within our production servers, and we keep all of our servers modern and up to date. We are confident that you will be very pleased with the service and speeds we have to offer you!

Due to popular demand, we’ve released a new product line up which we are pleased to present to the community: Master Reseller Hosting! We also are continuing the Cyber Week sale with some sweet discounts on Shared Hosting & VPS hosting. Check them out and enjoy!”
